amendment.description: Amendment sought to fully offset funding in the bill by increasing the rescission in the Callable Capital Account for Multilateral Development Banks by $195 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 and printed in the Congressional Record to fully offset the emergency supplemental appropriations bill by increasing the rescission in the Callable Capital Account for Multilateral Development Banks by $195 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 264 (Roll no. 69).
